<!-- treeTable --> <script src="/plugins/jquery-treetable/jquery.treetable.js"></script> <script> var table; $(function () { //刷新树表格 refreshTable(); //新增或修改菜单 $.jkj.validate('#modalForm', { submitHandler: function (form) { var item = $(form).serializeObject(); $.get('/data/treeTableAjaxData.json', $(form).serialize(), function (data) { $.jkj.modal.hide('#myModal'); //刷新 window.location.reload(); }, 'JSON'); } }); }); /** * 刷新树数据 */ function refreshTable() { $.get('/data/treeTableAjaxData.json', {}, function (data) { var html = ''; $.each(data.list, function (index, item) { html += data2html(item); }); $('#treeTable').find('tbody').html(html); //渲染成树 table = $.jkj.treeTable("#treeTable", { }); //展开所有节点 table.treetable('expandAll'); }); } function data2html(item) { var rows = ''; rows += '<tr data-tt-id="' + item.id + '" data-tt-parent-id="' + item.parentId + '"' + (item.hasChilds == '1' ? ' data-tt-branch="true"' : 'data-tt-branch="false"') + '>'; rows += '<td nowrap>'; rows += '<a href="#">' + item.name + '</a>'; rows += '</td>'; rows += '<td title="' + item.href + '">'; rows += item.href; rows += '</td>'; rows += '<td>'; rows += item.sort; rows += '</td>'; rows += '<td nowrap>'; rows += '<a href="javascript:updateItem(\'' + item.id + '\',\'' + item.parentId + '\')">修改</a>'; rows += ' <a href="javascript:deleteItem(\'' + item.id + '\')">'; rows += '删除'; rows += '</a>'; rows += ' <a href="javascript:createItem(\'' + item.id + '\')">添加下级菜单</a>'; rows += '</td>'; rows += '</tr>'; return rows; } /** * 新增 * @param id */ function createItem(id) { $('#myModalLabel').html('新增菜单'); $('#modalForm')[0].reset(); $.jkj.modal.showLocalModal('#myModal'); } /** * 修改 * @param id * @param parentId */ function updateItem(id, parentId) { //请求对象具体属性 $.get('/data/treeTableAjaxData.json', {id: id}, function (data) { data = { id: id, parentId: parentId, name: '表格', href: 'pages/components/tablelist/list1.html', sort: 1, remark: '备注内容' }; $('#myModalLabel').html('修改菜单'); $('#id').val(data.id); $('#parentId').val(data.parentId); $('#name').val(data.name); $('#href').val(data.href); $('#sort').val(data.sort); $('#remark').val(data.remark); $.jkj.modal.showLocalModal('#myModal'); }, 'JSON'); } /** * 删除 * @param id */ function deleteItem(id) { //删除 post $.get('/data/treeTableAjaxData.json', {id: id}, function (data) { table.treetable('removeNode', id); }, 'JSON'); } </script>
